gold.user: User wants to retrieve the details of a specific outgoing caller ID associated with their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: The response should include the SID, friendly name, and phone number of the outgoing caller ID.

gold.user: User needs to update the friendly name of an existing outgoing caller ID to reflect a new business name.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the update and return the updated details of the outgoing caller ID.

gold.user: User wants to delete an outgoing caller ID that is no longer in use to keep their account organized.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the outgoing caller ID.

gold.user: User wants to list all outgoing caller IDs associated with their Twilio account to review them.
gold.ideal: The response should include an array of outgoing caller IDs with their details such as SID and friendly name.
